
A button can be used to provide interactivity to the user, there are multiple variations of a button.

## When to use it

Use buttons when users need to either navigate or perform a specific action.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                            | Type                                                   | Default                   |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Visually and functionally disable the Button.                                          | `boolean`                                              | `this.isLoading ?? false` |
| `isLoading` | `is-loading` | Visually disables the button and shows a loading spinner and also disables the button. | `boolean`                                              | `false`                   |
| `label`     | `label`      | Label as a string                                                                      | `string`                                               | `'Button'`                |
| `size`      | `size`       | Size of the button                                                                     | `"large" \| "macro" \| "medium" \| "micro" \| "small"` | `'medium'`                |
| `tracking`  | --           | Tracking data related to the `button`'s events                                         | `ITracking`                                            | `undefined`               |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | Variant of the button                                                                  | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                             | `'secondary'`             |
